sourcesContent:
import { Box, Stack, Text } from '@chakra-ui/core'
import { useObserver } from 'mobx-react-lite'
import React from 'react'
import { useStore } from '../hooks/useStore'
import { AddExerciseButton } from './Home/AddExerciseButton'
import { ExerciseChoice } from './Home/ExerciseChoice'
import { ExerciseTimeChoice } from './Home/ExerciseTimeChoice'
import { RecoveryTimeChoice } from './Home/RecoveryTimeChoice'
import { RoundBox } from './Home/RoundBox'
import { RoundChoice } from './Home/RoundChoice'
import { TimerActions } from './Home/TimerActions'

export const CreateCommonArea: React.FC = () => {
    const { round } = useStore()

    return useObserver(() => (
        <Stack as='main' maxWidth='800px' mx='auto' p='4'>
            <Box>
                <Text as='h2' fontSize='2em'>
                    Create your timer
                </Text>
                <form
                    onSubmit={(e) => {
                        e.preventDefault()
                        round.addExercise()
                    }}
                >
                    <ExerciseChoice />
                    <ExerciseTimeChoice />
                    <RecoveryTimeChoice />
                    {round.rounds.size > 0 && <RoundChoice />}
                    <AddExerciseButton />
                </form>
            </Box>
            <Box mt='2'>
                {[...round.rounds.keys()].map((roundId) => (
                    <RoundBox
                        key={`round-${roundId}`}
                        round={round.rounds.get(roundId)!}
                    />
                ))}
            </Box>
            <TimerActions />
        </Stack>
    ))
}
